titles.title: Observing the 100th birthday of the late Les Paul, the "Wizard of Waukesha", and honoring his contributions to the American music industry.
Observing the 100th birthday of the late Les Paul, the "Wizard of Waukesha", and honoring his contributions to the American music industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Recognizes and celebrates the 100th birthday of the late Les Paul.
Commemorates his contributions to American society as a gifted musician, inventor, and musical pioneer.
